DOC.brief_title: The Effect Physical Exercise Reducing Pain Women Undergoing Mammography
DOC.detailed_description: This research aim evaluate relationship pre-mammography guide physical activity pain examination , evaluate impact intervention group patient undergo upper limb exercise ( SLE ) , compare another group woman subject exposure ( MNE ) , another group lower limb exercise ( LLE ) . This study randomize control trial , whose intervention sequence exercise body warm muscle stretching , perform systematic manner supervise physical educator . It expect find study possible impact physical exercise reduce pain mammography examination . The result check study association level physical activity , body mass index , breast density reduce pain effect group comparison mean variance value visual analogue scale ( VAS ) .
